name: Mining Mania (Aryan Tyagi)
description:
You get to move around collecting coins and using power-ups, all while trying to collect as many coins as you can before time runs out! And the best part? Different coins are worth different amounts, so you have to strategize to get the most valuable coins before time runs out.

One of the cool things about this game is that you can use the potion power-ups to give yourself an edge and make yourself bigger and faster! Another thing that makes this game so exciting is that it's a short minigame, so you can play it whenever you have a few minutes to spare. It's perfect for when you're waiting in line, or when you're on a break at work.

So what are you waiting for? Start collecting those coins! :)
